page.title: 06Schoolboy's Day -Thorpe
page.content: I get up at 7.30am. I have a wash and when I get dressed I often wear a tracksuit. Then I have my breakfast of Rice Crispies with milk on while I watch TVam. At 8.30am. I catch the bus to school at Todwick because the school in Thorpe closed in 1981.I arrive at 8.50am. and leave again at 3.25pm. We have dinner at 12.00 noon and afternoon lessons begin at 1.00pm. When I get home I watch TV, then I go out and play climbing trees or I climb on to the garage roof. When friends come I do the same but with them. I go back in at about 7.00pm. to watch TV. I might watch the news, or a serial like Airwolf and some other things till 9.00pm. I go to bed and read mainly nature books for about 2 hours then go to sleep.
